Get SRID(s) from a geometry/geography column in a full table

pgGetSRID.Rd

Get SRID(s) from a geometry/geography column in a full table

pgGetSRID(conn, name, geom)

Arguments

conn

A PostgreSQL connection
name

A schema/table name
geom

a geometry or geography column name
